name: gaussian

g16.script:
# Gaussian 16 configuration script

module load gaussian16

g16 < ${INPUT_FILE} | tee ${INPUT_FILE%.*}.out

description: Configuration template for Gaussian 16 computational chemistry software.

name: fluent

2022R1.script:
# Fluent 22R1 configuration script

module load fluent2201

export FLUENT_AFFINITY=0
export SLURM_ENABLED=1
FL_SCHEDULER_HOST_FILE=slurm.${SLURM_JOB_ID}.hosts
/bin/rm -rf ${FL_SCHEDULER_HOST_FILE}
scontrol show hostnames "$SLURM_JOB_NODELIST" >> $FL_SCHEDULER_HOST_FILE
export SCHEDULER_TIGHT_COUPLING=1

fluent ${FLUENT_SOLVER} -g -t$SLURM_NTASKS -i ${JOURNAL_FILE} -mpi=intel -cnf=${FL_SCHEDULER_HOST_FILE}

description: Configuration template for Ansys Fluent simulations.

2024a.script:
# MATLAB 2024a configuration script

module load matlab/2024a

matlab -nodisplay -nosplash -r $(basename ${INPUT_FILE} .m)
